title: Identity > Image
verse_text: So God created mankind in his own image, in the image of God he created them; male and female he created them.
insight: The world sells image. God gives identity.
Image fades. Identity remains. Don’t confuse the filter with the foundation.
one_minute_win: Look in the mirror and say: “I am God’s image-bearer.”
declaration: My worth is in God’s image, not man’s opinion.
related_devotionals: Psalm 139:14 Devotional - Fearfully and Wonderfully Made
